item.title: ChatGPT Needs Prompt Engineering
item.description: A good response requires a good prompt The term “Prompt Engineer” is starting to pop up as a person that crafts prompts for ChatGPT and other AI assistants. “But wait a minute,” you say, “wasn’t the AI assistant supposed to make it easy for everyone to take advantage of its superior language capabilities?” “Now I’m supposed to engineer prompts?” Well, yes and no.
